polygraphs , which attempt to determine someone 's honesty by polygraphs physiological response to certain questions Last year , Congress prohibited most private sector employers from using lie dectectors to screen job applicants or randomly test workers Exempted from the rules were federal , state and local governments , firms that do sensitive work for agencies like the CIA and FBI , companies that provide security services and those that make or distribute controlled substances '' Judy Crockett , who fought on behalf of the federal law for the American Civil Liberties Union think CIA 's appropriate to seek if someone is lying
